amendment.description: Amendment places a 2,000 acre limit on oil exploration on the Coastal Plain in the Alaska National Wildlife Refuge.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-69 to prohibit the maximum surface area covered by production and support facilities, including airstrips, berms and piers, on the coastal plain of Alaska's Arctic National Wildlife Refuge from exceeding 2,000 acres.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (NM) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 202 (Roll no. 134).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Wilson (NM).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (NM) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 202 (Roll no. 134).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
